title: Ticket #194: Add times to Condor specific build result reports
description:
Adding durations to our build result reports would make identifying surprising changes easier. It's a crude tool, but seeing a test run that normally takes 2 hours take 4 is cause for investigation. Specific points to investigate:

  • Condor Latest Build/Test Results: Add duration below "Failed 0" line. Not all that useful, but for consistency with other pages.
  • A single branch: Add duration below "Failed 0" line. More useful, as you can compare durations over time/builds.
  • expanded results: Add a row at the very end or very top "Duration". Not quite as useful, but for consistency.
  • Test history: This should probably be an option that, when turned on, replaces the exit codes with duration. Very useful for identifying a sudden spike in a given test's duration.
creator: adesmet
